# Robots.txt for Techlis - AI Software Development Company
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow admin or private areas (if any exist in the future)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /.well-known/

# Allow all search engines to crawl the site
Allow: /services
Allow: /about
Allow: /blog
Allow: /contact

# Crawl delay (optional - helps with server load)
Crawl-delay: 1

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://techlis.com/sitemap.xml

# Additional information
# Host: https://techlis.com
